response.overview: Gani Comes back to his village after completing his education and wants to change his village, with that intention he arranges a meeting to discuss the growth of the village with youth of the village. This is not looks fine to Naaga, a youth leader of the village who is the childhood friend of Gani. This creates a challenge between the youth groups and forces to play a traditional master game. The Challenge about the one who ever wins the Game will be elected as president of the Village in the next upcoming elections. Finally the "one" among two Gani and Naga wins the Game and will be elected as Village President.
response.title: Pothubera
